name: Grilled Herbed Tilapia in Foil Packets
author: PRINCESSKAROLY
summary: Tilapia is a mild, white fish that is flaky and yummy. You can take this recipe for grilling it in foil packets and alter it to your own liking. The tilapia is very forgiving.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 ½ tablespoons butter, cut into pieces
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate
Cut a piece of heavy duty aluminum foil large enough to make an airy foil pouch to hold tilapia fillets
Place fillets on top of the foil and season with dill, salt, and pepper
Place chives on top of fillets, followed by butter
Cook fillets on the preheated grill until they flake easily with a fork, 10 to 15 minutes
